bibl.title: Telegram from H.A. Bonzi to Henry Rose Carter, February 28, [19--]

div1.p: Bonzi informs Carter that a vaccine is being shipped by the Rockefeller Foundation.

div1.head: Telegram from H.A. Bonzi to Henry Rose Carter, February 28, [19--]
div1.opener:

but, Rockfeller, foundation, ins, shipping, on,
